hero.title: PolicyBridge.ai
hero.subtitle: Verify contract safety before signing
hero.description:
PolicyBridge.ai provides the first line of compliance risk screening
for cross-border contracts for SMEs without professional legal teams

productIntroduction.title: Product Introduction
productIntroduction.subtitle: Learn About Our Core Advantages and Features

advantage.title: Our Core Advantages
advantage.subtitle: Unlike traditional LLMs, PolicyBridge.ai provides professional services based on real-time legal data

database.title: Contract risks often arise from outdated legal knowledge
database.point1: Compliance risks in cross-border contracts often stem from neglecting regulatory updates
database.point2: Changes in sanctions, embargoes, or tariff rules can directly affect contract enforceability
database.point3: Relying on outdated legal understanding may result in clauses being invalidated or restricted in disputes
database.point4: Differences in rules between countries and regions are often mistakenly identified as 'industry practices'

difference.title: PolicyBridge.ai serves compliance risk assessment, not general AI Q&A
difference.point1: Compliance risk assessment focuses on rule application, not text understanding
difference.point2: Cross-border compliance heavily relies on specific transaction contexts and is difficult to generalize
difference.point3: Answers without traceable sources are unsuitable for compliance decisions
difference.point4: Real risks often come from regulatory changes rather than contract wording

caseLaw.title: Many contract clause issues are not written in laws, but in disputes
caseLaw.point1: Numerous cross-border trade disputes show that risky clauses often emerge during performance or dispute stages
caseLaw.point2: Common dispute types typically focus on contract breaches, liability allocation, payments, and quality issues
caseLaw.point3: Similar contract structures may present completely different risk outcomes in different disputes
caseLaw.point4: Combining legal practice experience helps identify easily overlooked risk points before signing

home.heroDescription: PolicyBridge AI provides the first line of compliance risk screening for cross-border contracts for SMEs without professional legal teams
home.taxWarning: Is the Golden Tax Phase 4 coming? We help you discover tax risks before signing
home.whyChooseSubtitle: The essential difference between professional legal AI and general AI

smartReview.title: Smart Contract Review
smartReview.description: Upload contract documents, AI automatically identifies key clauses and conducts comprehensive review against the latest laws and regulations

riskAlert.title: Compliance Risk Alert
riskAlert.description: Real-time monitoring of embargo lists and tariff policy changes, proactively alerting potential compliance risks

multiCountry.title: Multi-jurisdictional Comparison
multiCountry.description: Support for comparative analysis of laws and regulations across multiple countries and regions to formulate optimal trade strategies

caseMatching.title: Intelligent Case Matching
caseMatching.description: Based on a database of 1000+ real cases, AI intelligently analyzes your issues, quickly matches relevant precedents and solutions, making complex legal issues simple and clear

q1.question: What is the difference between trial and paid versions?
q1.answer: The trial version only supports text legal consultation, without contract upload and Word document generation. Paid versions provide complete contract review, risk analysis, and document generation functions.

q2.question: What scenarios is the Professional version suitable for?
q2.answer: The Professional version is suitable for users who occasionally need contract review, charged per contract at ‚Ç¨9.9, supporting unlimited follow-up and revision generation, suitable for individuals or small transactions.

q3.question: What is the difference between monthly and yearly membership?
q3.answer: Monthly ‚Ç¨39.9/month, yearly ‚Ç¨329/year (about ‚Ç¨27.4/month), annual payment saves ‚Ç¨150. Functions are identical, both support unlimited contract upload and document generation.

q4.question: What services does enterprise customization include?
q4.answer: Enterprise customization provides enterprise system integration, multi-user management, API interfaces, private deployment, dedicated support and other customized services, suitable for enterprise customers with special needs.

q5.question: How to choose the right package?
q5.answer: For occasional consultation choose trial version; for reviewing 1-2 contracts choose Professional version; for frequent contract review choose membership; for enterprise users with custom needs choose enterprise customization.

termsOfService.title: PolicyBridge.ai Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.content1: PolicyBridge.ai (hereinafter referred to as "the Platform" or "we") is an AI-powered cross-border trade compliance review assistance tool. Services provided by the Platform include but are not limited to:
list1: Reference queries for laws and regulations
section1.warning: All analysis results and recommendations provided by the Platform are for reference only and do not constitute formal legal opinions or professional consultation.
section1.content2: Before making any legal or business decisions, users should:
list2: Make judgments based on specific circumstances

section2.title: 2. Disclaimer
section2.item1: Accuracy Limitations: Although we strive to keep our database updated in real-time, we do not guarantee that all information is 100% accurate, complete, or current.
section2.item2: Technical Limitations: AI technology has inherent limitations and may produce misjudgments or omissions.
section2.item3: Scope Limitations: The Platform primarily targets international trade compliance scenarios and may not be applicable to all legal fields.
section2.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
list: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of this service
We are not responsible for the accuracy or availability of third-party data sources
We are not liable for decisions made based on recommendations from the Platform
userList: Bear all risks of using this service
Be responsible for the content of uploaded documents
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Not use the Platform's analysis results as the sole basis for decision-making

section3.title: 3. Data Privacy and Security
section3.content2: Your data will be used for:
list2: AI model training (using anonymized data only)
section3.retention1: Default retention period: Review records are automatically deleted after 30 days
section3.retention2: Immediate deletion: Users can choose to delete immediately after review completion
section3.retention3: Long-term retention: Users can choose long-term storage (requires explicit consent)

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content1: All content on the Platform (including but not limited to software, interface design, text, images) is protected by intellectual property laws.
list: You retain ownership of uploaded content
You grant us a license to process this content to provide services
We will not use your content for unauthorized purposes

section5.title: 5. Contact Us
section5.content: For any questions or concerns, please contact:
section5.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 24 hours

termsOfService.agreement: By using the Platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to comply with these Terms of Service.

privacyPolicy.title: PolicyBridge.ai Privacy Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: PolicyBridge.ai ("we", "our", or "the Platform") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.item1: Account Information: Email address, password (encrypted storage)
section1.item2: Contract Documents: Files you upload for review
section1.item3: Contact Information: Information you provide through customer service
section1.item4: Usage Data: Access times, feature usage, click behavior
section1.item5: Device Information: Browser type, operating system, IP address
section1.item6: Technical Logs: Error logs, performance data

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
list1: Process and analyze your uploaded contract documents
Provide compliance review results and recommendations
section2.highlight: Anonymized Data Analysis: We may use anonymized data to improve AI model performance, optimize user experience, and develop new features.
section2.commitment: Important Commitment: Data used for training is fully anonymized and cannot identify individuals.

section3.title: 3. Data Security Measures
section3.item1: Encrypted Transmission: All data transmission uses TLS/SSL encryption
section3.item2: Encrypted Storage: Sensitive data is encrypted in the database
section3.item3: Access Control: Strict permission management and authentication
section3.item4: Security Audits: Regular security assessments and penetration testing
section3.content: We use Supabase as our database service provider
section3.compliance: Supabase complies with SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, and other security standards
section3.evaluation: All third-party service providers undergo rigorous security evaluation

section4.title: 4. Data Retention and Deletion
tableRows: Deleted within 30 days after account closure
Can choose immediate deletion or long-term retention
Used for troubleshooting and security analysis
section4.option1: Immediate Deletion: Delete all related data immediately after review completion
section4.option3: Long-Term Retention: Actively choose long-term storage (can be deleted anytime)
methods: Select "Delete Immediately" on the review completion page
Batch delete all data in account settings
Contact customer service to request deletion

section5.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
section5.right1: Right to Access: You have the right to view all personal information we hold about you
section5.right2: Right to Rectification: You can update or correct inaccurate personal information
section5.right3: Right to Deletion: You can request deletion of your personal information
section5.right4: Right to Export: You can export your data in common formats
section5.right5: Right to Withdraw Consent: You can withdraw previously given consent at any time

section6.title: 6. Contact Us
section6.content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact:

privacyPolicy.agreement: By using the Platform, you confirm that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

disclaimer.title: PolicyBridge.ai Disclaimer
disclaimer.importantNotice: Important Notice: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using this service

section1.title: 1. Nature of Service Statement
section1.content1: PolicyBridge.ai is an AI-powered auxiliary reference tool designed to help users preliminarily identify potential compliance issues in cross-border trade contracts.
section1.warning: All analysis, recommendations, and information provided by the Platform do NOT constitute:
notConstitute: Evidence directly usable in legal proceedings
recommendations: Consult a professional lawyer before signing important contracts
Conduct independent due diligence for matters involving significant interests
Make decisions based on specific circumstances and latest regulations
Do not use the Platform's analysis as the sole basis for decision-making

section2.title: 2. Data Accuracy Statement
commitments: Regularly update legal and regulatory databases
Obtain information from official authoritative sources
limitations: All information is 100% accurate, complete, or current
Coverage of all laws in all countries and regions
AI analysis results are completely error-free

section3.title: 3. Technical Limitations Statement
section3.content1: Artificial intelligence technology has inherent limitations:
limits: Understanding of complex situations may be incomplete
section3.suitableFor: The Platform is primarily designed for:

section4.title: 4. Liability Limitations
section4.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for:
noLiability: Contract disputes arising from use of this service
Business decisions made based on the Platform's recommendations
Loss of profits, business opportunities, or goodwill

section5.title: 5. User Responsibilities
responsibilities: Take full responsibility for their own decisions
Use the Platform as a reference tool

section6.title: 6. Data Security Statement
section6.content: We take reasonable security measures to protect your data, but:
limitations: Not liable for security incidents such as hacker attacks
Recommend users take their own security measures
privacyTips: Please review our Privacy Policy for details
Recommend desensitizing sensitive information before uploading
Can choose to delete data immediately after review

section7.title: 7. Contact Information
section7.content: For any questions about this disclaimer, please contact:

reminder.title: Important Reminder
reminder.content: Before using this service, please ensure you have:
checklist: Read and understood this disclaimer in full
Understood the nature and limitations of the Platform's services
Known when to consult a professional lawyer
Agreed to bear the risks of using this service

disclaimer.finalAgreement: By using the Platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted all terms of this disclaimer.
